title: Best of the Program | Guests: Bill O'Reilly & Rep. Jim Jordan | 11/19/21
description:
Bill O’Reilly joins for his weekly news recap, discussing President Biden's "Build Back Better" bill and the Rittenhouse trial. Rep. Jim Jordan joins to discuss the whistleblower email he received that confirmed the FBI is monitoring parents who speak out against school boards. Glenn discusses the science of Thanksgiving and how being thankful is beneficial to our health.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
